tweets.text: A Flood Alert has been issued by @EnvAgency: https://t.co/ATBe4KgNoZ for the Western Rother for Tues Dec 15th. Please take care of yourself, family & neighbours, especially if elderly or vulnerable. See the WSCC website for advice on keeping safe & well: https://t.co/rVWNxD3VH2 https://t.co/Epxrc9k0oo
Health expert raises concerns on plans to build incinerator in North Cumbria https://t.co/ZNdUgaXjUY Lets burn less

We are delighted to announce our 'Bringing the Limestone Becks back to Life' project on the lower Branston Beck has been awarded a grant from the  #GreenRecoveryChallengeFund 
A great project that will transform this section of the beck for people and wildlife #lovelincsrivers https://t.co/CiT8EBaSa4

Want to find out about our plans to build new #flood defences to protect homes & businesses in #TenburyWells #Worcestershire?

While we can't currently meet you face-to-face, head to our virtual event to hear our proposals to reduce the risk of #flooding   https://t.co/60B1bdpFlz https://t.co/aFHAFV8s2T

Excited to launch our new video! Learn how #PropertyFloodResilience measures have changed the lives of four people living in the #SouthWest of England: 
https://t.co/4m7SFrf8vK

#BeFloodReady
@CornwallCouncil @EnvAgencySW @DevonCC @Torbay_Council @plymouthcc  @IoSCouncil

Fab video of our River Keekle restoration made by local drone pilot Chris O'Leary! This project to remove a 2.5km plastic liner and restore the riverbed was done with @OpenSpaceGB @AECOM @AquaUoS @BerryGlobalInc  and funded by @EnvAgencyNW #weg https://t.co/Ig2R9qeHqX

tweets.text: Another story about UK waste being dumped on other countries. When will @EnvAgency get to grips with the issue? Europe's 'recycled' waste ends up being illegally dumped in Turkey https://t.co/Z8dMqws02p
@robintuddenham @mrsk3r @floodawareapp @EnvAgencyYNE @YorkshireWater @slowtheflow_UK @PaulSwaz @HebdenbridgeOrg Partnership of the winning! üôå

@FoeCambridge @lewis_herbert @greenarteries @Feargal_Sharkey @TerryMac999 @markrwilliamson @dottymcl @BBCCambs @CambsCC @wre @GreaterCambs @EnvAgency @DefraUK @cllrbridget @ab4scambs @OliviaRudgard @camcitco @cllrkatie @DanielZeichner @SouthCambs @mhclg @DefraGovUK Net zero carbon is one thing, but (conveniently?) ignores #water.

We are in a #ClimateEmergency, but also a #NatureEmergency.

Water is the basis of life. Without it our ecosystems collapse.

We need Net Zero Water too. https://t.co/jGkUPXGes5

A pilot in the Littleton, Headbourne Worthy and Kings Worthy area of #Winchester will investigate long term options to improve resilience to flooding and drought, working with local councillors, @EnvAgencySE  @WinchesterCity  @mod_dio and @SouthernWater 

https://t.co/P49H5DM3Dk

I think Mirfield 25 is  a @CaddickGroup site?   Staff throwing foul liquid onto public highway on a route to nearby school  he  told resident , rain will wash it away   Check Highways Act S161 clause 4 ? @LdrTony https://t.co/PBztLI8nSM

tweets.text: A Flood Alert has been issued by @EnvAgency: https://t.co/cBVJdw4RYT for Langstone to Emsworth Harbour for Tuesday 15th Dec. Please take care of yourself, family & neighbours, especially if vulnerable. See WSCC's website for advice on keeping safe & well: https://t.co/G4BTENs8Hu https://t.co/NTB49oCNso
@neilselman147 @fslconsult @flowerboxorguk @MFitzoliver @meganroseltd About time...

tweets.text:
Is the #ThamesPath safe to walk this #weekend or flooded?
Visit @EnvAgencySE Flood Warning https://t.co/wGRCLBp8eb before you set out. Plan to divert if necessary. It's dangerous to walk thru' floodwater. 
Photos from Oct 2019. 
@VisitThamesCoUk @VisitChilterns @MariaHerlihyEA https://t.co/kMSWJN9vPa
